comment: Export to JSON plugin for PHPMyAdmin

data.name: user30318101
data.text: I love the cold feel of a brass doorknob, nothing beats it!

data.name: Anonymous
data.text: I do have to agree, I look forward to the next day knowing I'll be able to touch a cold doorknob in the morning!

data.name: knobhater22
data.text: Honestly, I much prefer a handles, they are far easier to use than knobs.

data.name: vintagewoodexpert
data.text: I like hand carved wooden doorknobs the best!!

data.name: Anonymous
data.text: That's really neat! Do you make all of your doorknobs custom around the house?

data.name: Anonymous
data.text: Same! I love custom designed doorknobs.

data.name: knobnewbie
data.text: Hi guys, kind of new to the doorknob scene. Does anyone have any recommendations for suppliers? Thanks!

data.name: craftexpert76
data.text: Hiya newbie! I usually custom make my doorknobs, but when I need to purchase premade ones I head to amazingdoorknobshop.com

data.name: oldmanjeff
data.text: Back in my day we always used knobs in the house, no handles in sight!!!1!

data.name: buddy43
data.text: I'm so proud of this community, beautiful stuff guys

data.name: yeeter
data.text: My doorknob is squeaky, any good way to fix it?

data.name: craftexpert76
data.text: Just spray a bit of WD40 in there, should clear it right up
